channel.description: Recent content in Peer Exchange on Skycoin Project Material

item.title: Development Update #80 - August 25, 2015
item.description: GoAgent was forced off of Github by state security - https://github.com/goagent/goagent A few days ago Shadowsocks author was contacted and forced to rescind the repo by state security - https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks - https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks/commit/938bba32a4008bdde9c064dda6a0597987ddef54 All the tools for breaching the firewall are being purged. Development Update: Peer Exchange Algorithm Problems There is no satisfactory solution for sharing peer lists. You should only share peers if they accept incoming connections, otherwise the client spends a lot of time trying to connect to the majority of peers, which cannot accept incoming connections, so sharing the peer does not help anyone.
